column4: I don't suppose anyone can help me with packages (and configure scripts) constantly complaining that I don't have libc6 when I've reinstalled several times?
I don't suppose anyone can help me with packages (and configure scripts) constantly complaining that I don't have libc6 when I've reinstalled several times?
*packages*, as in Ubuntu .deb packages, complain about missing libc6?
yeah, and configure scripts I've run
